FAQs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQs.description: Your Essential Guide to Common Questions

questions.question: What is AURORA?
questions.answer: AURORA is a platform that enables you to quickly create professional websites for your meme token. Just select a template, personalize it with your token’s details, and download your website files instantly.

questions.question: How does AURORA work?
questions.answer: AURORA streamlines the creation of your meme token’s website. Select a template, customize it with your token information, and instantly receive the website files ready for download—no technical skills needed

questions.question: Do we host your website?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide full hosting for your website. Once you’ve created and customized your site using our templates, we take care of the hosting process, ensuring that your website is securely stored and available online. Our hosting is reliable, fast, and optimized for performance, so your website runs smoothly at all times, with no additional setup required from you.

questions.question: Is website hosting included?
questions.answer: Each template is designed with essential features for your memecoin, including token details, buy buttons, tokenomics, roadmap, team profiles, FAQ section, and social media links. All templates are mobile-friendly and optimized for top performance

questions.question: How much does it cost?
questions.answer: We offer two pricing plans: the Standard option for 0.045 SOL per website, and the Premium option for 0.25 SOL, which includes access to exclusive templates and advanced features. Select the plan that works best for your requirements.

footer.description: Join thousands of creators who are rapidly building the future of Solana-based memecoins. Whether you’re launching your first token or expanding your project, our platform provides all the tools you need to design, customize, and launch a professional website for your Solana memecoin—quickly and with ease.
